menu.course:
Starter (Choice of): Carpaccio di manzo con rughetta: Carpaccio of beef, marinated with olive oil, lemon juice and black pepper, served on a bed of rocket salad with parmesan shavings.
Insalata di Mare:Mixed vegetables, backed gratin.

course.title: Main Course(Choice of):
course.option: Millefoglie di vegetali: Millefeuille of vegetables. Layers of fresh home made pasta to alternate with slices of fried aubergines and courgettes with béchamel cream and parmesan cheese
Paccheri ai frutti di mare: Paccheri pasta with sea food(clams, mussels, squid, whole prawns), garlic, olive oil, white wine and cherry tomatoes.
Ravioli burro e salvia: Ravioli pasta with butter and sage. Fresh pasta filled with meat and mortadella, sautéed in a pan with butter and sage and served with plenty of parmesan cheese.
course.title: Second Course(Choice of):
course.option: Agnello al forno con patate: Lamb shoulder with backed potatoes, onion, rosemary, black pepper, olive oil and white wine.
Calamari ripieni: Squid stuffed with chopped tentacles, garlic, olive oil, black olives, bread crumbs, anchovies and parsley, black pepper, pecorino romano and white wine.
Petto di anatra al peppe verde: Sauteed duck breast with green peppercorn, shallot and butter, served on a bed of peppers.

menu.course:
Desserts Macedonia di Frutta: Fresh fruit salad sprinkled with lemon and sugar.
